programme.desc: As Darryl (Deshae Frost) and Tan (David Lim) grapple with family issues, a private security job at a boxing match lands Deacon (Jay Harrington) in more danger than expected.

programme.title: THE ROOKIE- FEDS (SEASON 1) #14
programme.desc: When a billionaires daughter goes missing, he publicly announces a hefty reward for her safe return, sparking concern for the FBI.

programme.title: FBI- MOST WANTED (SEASON 6) #18
programme.desc: The Fugitive Task Force is thrown into the world of the wealthy and twisted after a Rhode Island socialite is murdered in her own mansion. Meanwhile, Barnes contemplates big changes.

programme.title: ROOKIE BLUE (SEASON 5) #9
programme.desc: 15 Division is assigned to a community outreach program, Moving Day, to help tenants move out of a subsidized-housing complex thats being torn down.

programme.title: AMERICAN NINJA WARRIOR (SEASON 15) #7
programme.desc: The qualifying rounds continue in L.A. with ninjas from across the country taking on the worlds most challenging obstacle course. Competitors as young as 15 return to take on veterans and will have a chance to face a taller Mega Warped Wall.

programme.title: ELSBETH (SEASON 1) #2
programme.desc: After the loathed co-op board president of a luxury pre-war building falls off her balcony to her death, Elsbeth and Kaya are called to the scene to dig for a lead.

programme.title: CORONER (SEASON 1) #7
programme.desc: A victim causes a building lockdown and Jenny (Serinda Swan) is forced to team up with a former colleague. Detective McAvoy (Roger Cross) is on the trail of a newly released inmate, determined to make his freedom short-lived.

programme.title: SPIDER-MAN 3
programme.desc: In Spider-Man 3, based on the legendary Marvel Comics series, Peter Parker has finally managed to strike a balance between his devotion to M.J. and his duties as a superhero.

programme.title: Brothers Five
programme.desc: The five Kao brothers, separated since birth, are unaware that the master of Teng Lung Manor has killed their father. All five however, vow to defeat the vicious gangsters at the manor due to their bullying ways. After reuniting and with much discipline and hard work, the Kaos are prepared to face Lung and his gang.

programme.title: Rivals of Kung Fu
programme.desc: As Shen and Wong Fei Hungs relationship turns sour, Shen frames Wong and his disciple for murder. They are saved by a businessman Zhou, but Wong must win the Lion Dance Trophy to return Zhous favour. Can Wong Fei Hung defeat all skilled martial artists and complete his mission?

programme.title: The Bride from Hell
programme.desc: A young business man marries a pretty and much sought-after young bride, not knowing that she carries the spirit of a girl raped by her uncle and murdered along with her parents. Justice must be done, and it aint pretty!

programme.title: The Anonymous Heroes
programme.desc: In this action comedy, two young men join a rebel group after the Chinese Revolution of 1911 and accidentally become patriotic heroes. Assisted by a warlords daughter, they successfully help the rebels steal weapons from the warlord.

programme.title: The Tiger and the Widow
programme.desc: The Liu Chia-liang trained Hui Ying-hung was considered the top action martial arts female star in the 1980s. It is her martial arts abilities that Michelle Yeoh tries to emulate. In The Tiger and the Widow, Hui Ying-hung is somehow mixed up in a salt smuggling ring that stinks of missing persons and rotten dilemmas.

programme.title: Opium And The Kung-Fu Master
programme.desc: Tie Qiao San, head of the Ten Guangdong Tigers, is an honourable master with many disciples. As opium becomes popular among the nobles, Tie starts taking it and gradually harms his body. When an opium houses owner defeats Tie in a fight and he is only saved from being killed by his disciple, Tie vows to quit opium and get back on his feet.

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu-Lan
programme.desc: Mulan disguises herself as a male soldier to replace her aged father in a war against the barbarians. Her courage brings her victory in battles and she was promoted to a general. When Mulan returns home with glory, the chief commander asks her to marry his daughter, forcing Mulan to reveal her true identity.

programme.title: Clans of Intrigue
programme.desc: Heroic outlaw Chu Liu Xiang is dining with his friend Monk Wu Hua, when Gong from the Holy Water Palace appears and accuses Chu of stealing the holy water from her Palace and using it for various murders. Chu denies, and is given a month to find the murderer or be killed by Gong. To prove his innocence, Chu decides to investigate the case...

programme.title: My Name Aint Suzie
programme.desc: Young Mei Li works as a bar girl in Wanchai to make a living. When she meets Jimmy in the bar, she thinks he is her true love and falls crazily in love with him. When Jimmy has to leave, Mei Li is devastated. It is not until she encounters the triad boss Ying that she finally found someone to count on.

programme.title: My Rebellious Son
programme.desc: A corrupt official attempts to steal a priceless Buddha statue from a temple to please a group of Westerners. Luckily, Doctor Zhang and his son manage to defeat the Western boxers, the Japanese Kendo opponents and the Western longsword fighters with Chinese kung fu, thus saving the Buddha statue.

programme.title: Sex, Love and Hate
programme.desc: This masterpiece spins three interconnected tales about Hong Kong societys differing views on love and what women want from love. Follow a trio of Hong Kong women as they explore relationships and fulfil their hopes of finding true love.

programme.title: A Deadly Secret
programme.desc: A corrupt magistrate, obsessed with finding a hidden treasure, jails and tortures his daughters lover and buries his daughter alive! Ironically, it is in her coffin that the secret to the hidden treasure is found, setting off a frenzy of destruction.

programme.title: Lets Fall In Love
programme.desc: Da Yung, the son of a rich entrepreneur, meets Lian Lian, the niece of a kindergarten principal by chance. They fall into a misunderstanding on the first meeting, causing Da Yung to lose his wallet. Further misunderstanding occurs when he tries to get her to act as his fiance so as to drive away two women whom he does not like...

programme.title: Forbidden Tales of Two Cities
programme.desc: Li Han-hsiang wrote and directed this charming and fascinating comedy, Forbidden Tales Of Two Cities. The two cities in the picture are Macau, where a love quartet is a morally-unsound source for sexual entertainment; and Hong Kong, where a woman enters a gamblers apartment to find four shackles hanging from his ceiling to aid in kinky activities.

programme.title: The Kid With A Tattoo
programme.desc: Young Bao Tong witnesses the brutal murder of his kung fu master by a vicious villain. A large eagle tattoo on Baos chest was spotted by the killer as he escapes. Can Bao escape from the killer?

programme.title: The Kid With A Tattoo
programme.desc: Young Bao Tong witnesses the brutal murder of his kung fu master by a vicious villain. A large eagle tattoo on Baos chest was spotted by the killer as he escapes. Can Bao escape from the killer?

programme.title: The Jade Raksha
programme.desc: A fearsome swordswoman known as The Jade Raksha appears in the martial arts world and begins killing people whose surname is Yan. A swordsman figures out who she is and asks her why. Apparently a Yan killed her family 18 years ago and she only has vengeance on her mind...

programme.title: Human Lanterns
programme.desc: Zhao was once defeated by Long in a duel. 7 years later, Long asks Zhao to make a unique lantern on his behalf to win the lantern contest, while Zhao plans for revenge. When Longs wife suddenly disappears one day and he hears about the story of human lanterns, Long suspects Zhao may be involved in the incident...

programme.title: The Eight Diagram Pole Fighter
programme.desc: The Yang Generals were ambushed by the enemies and only two of the sons survived. The fifth son of Yangs escapes to Shaolin temple and learns the pole-fighting techniques from the monks, eventually creating his own Eight Diagram Pole Fight and teaming up with the Shaolin monks to avenge his family.

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: As Monkey and his gang make their way to the West through Fire Mountain, they ran into the evil Princess Iron Fan, Madam White Bone and her sexy sister, and have to fight their way through.

programme.title: Lady Of The Law
programme.desc: Chan, the chief of Wan Sheng Escort, is forced to raise his opponents son, Yim. While Chan forbids Yim to practice martial arts, Yim secretly learns it. Ten years later, a rapist appears and Yim is arrested by a lady constable as the suspect. The rapist turns out to be Chans elder son and Yim is framed by the Chans. Can Yim prove his innocence?

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: Ying Tai disguises herself as a boy to go to school and falls hopelessly in love with her classmate, Shan Bo. After Shan Bo realizes her true identity, he proposes marriage to Ying Tai. However, they are kept apart as she is engaged to another man. Knowing Shan Bo died in despair, Ying Tai is in deep sorrow and kills herself at his grave.

programme.title: Ambitious Kung Fu Girl
programme.desc: The lovely Michelle Mei Suet plays a spoiled girl Szu-szu who ignores her true love Yang Fan to go off in search of a swordsman Chin Ko she idolizes. The search sets off one great action scene after another, until shes threatened to be sold into slavery but Yang Fan arrives in the nick of time! This amusing and entertaining variation on the standard kung-fu film is definitely a winner.

programme.title: Beyond the Great Wall
programme.desc: Wang Zhao Jun refuses to bribe the imperial painter, so he draws an ugly portrait of her, preventing her from being selected by the Emperor until they meet in person. The painter ends up in exile and plots for Wang to marry the Huns warlord as a revenge. The Emperor rejects this, provoking a war which is only averted when Wang sacrifices herself.

programme.title: One-armed Swordsman
programme.desc: Accepted to the Golden Sword School after his father sacrificed his life to save his master, Fang Kang is resented by his fellow pupils and decides to leave. His masters daughter challenges him to a fight and cuts off his arm. Fang masters the art of sword fighting with one arm and finds himself returning to the School to save his master again.

programme.title: The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This side-splitting comedy sees naive Ah Niu headed to Hong Kong, where he is repeatedly exploited and taken advantage of, and eventually finds himself arrested and imprisoned! Can he survive difficult times and finally overcome adversity?

programme.title: The Black Tavern
programme.desc: This sword-filled thriller centres on The Black Tavern an inn where the down and dirty meet to plot nefarious doings. A bunch of villains are lured to the inn by a rumour about a valuable treasure being hidden there. After all the backstabbing and killings, they realise that it is a trap created to wipe them out once and for all...

programme.title: The Emperor and the Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperors plot once again.

programme.title: Tales of Larceny
programme.desc: Connecting all the antics of bosses, monks, beggars, and thieves is the slippery and sinuous efforts of three pickpockets so adept at their chosen skill that they can even trick three beauties of their underwear without missing a step.

programme.title: The Dancing Millionairess
programme.desc: Peter was a key dancer in a dance troupe and applied to be the chauffeur of a rich girl, Betty. When he is rumoured to be her lover, Betty is furious and goes undercover as a reporter to investigate the rumour. They fall in love in the process, and after putting Peter through many tests, they finally seal their love with a dance.

programme.title: The Dancing Millionairess
programme.desc: Peter was a key dancer in a dance troupe and applied to be the chauffeur of a rich girl, Betty. When he is rumoured to be her lover, Betty is furious and goes undercover as a reporter to investigate the rumour. They fall in love in the process, and after putting Peter through many tests, they finally seal their love with a dance.

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: The movie consists of four stories of the Mad Monk helping others, from saving a mother and daughter from crumbling walls, to helping hawkers deal with bullies, recovering stolen money for a young man and punishing a devious court official and his son.

programme.title: Shadow Girl
programme.desc: A young swordswoman becomes invisible during the day and a monster at night after taking her grandmas pill. She ruined the wedding of a bandit chiefs daughter using her powers and is hunted down by them for revenge. Will she escape the hunt?

programme.title: Fangs of the Cobra
programme.desc: Incredibly, the title serpent is not a harbinger of horror, but actually the films hero. This virtuous viper sniffs out bombs, fights gangs, battles a baby-killing rodent and even takes on a duplicitous woman. This one-of-a-kind thriller will be applauded by reptile fans everywhere.

programme.title: The Reckless Cricket
programme.desc: Inspired by Drunken Master, this kung fu comedy features a bumbling martial artist creating a cricket-style fighting arts to fight and defeat the different martial artists who have beaten him before.

programme.title: Tiger Killer
programme.desc: Wu Song is appointed as chief constable after killing a tiger with his bare hands when drunk. The wife of his brother Wu Da Lang, seduces Wu Song but gets rejected by him, and engages in an affair with a rich man. They poison Wu Da Lang when he finds out about their affair. To avenge his brothers death, Wu Song kills both of them.

programme.title: The Spirit of the Sword
programme.desc: Water Clan Chief is severely wounded by a samurai killer shortly before the annual duel at Tai Lake. He sends his brother Bao Yu on a long journey to find an antidote for him. On the way, Bao Yu encounters Little Princess and falls in love with her, not knowing that she is hiding a secret plot...

programme.title: The Lark
programme.desc: Sixties pop star Carrie Ku plays the Little Lark in this romantic-drama of mistaken identity that is a treasure trove of some of the most popular Mandarin songs of all time.

programme.title: The Emperor and his Brother
programme.desc: The Emperor Qianlong is not the legitimate successor to the throne at birth, but he only learns the truth when two senior members of a subversive anti-government secret organisation contact him years later. As it happens, the chef of this organisation is Qianlongs younger brother and they must now confront each other in opposing roles...

programme.title: King Drummer
programme.desc: A young musician Chi Chiang is hired by the manager of a popular band when the groups drummer/leader Charlie, quits to join a rival group. The new drummer becomes an immediate hit, causing Charlie to be very jealous. Furthermore, the young drummers mother is dead set against him having a music career.

programme.title: The Hidden Power Of Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: Defeated villain Sung Ching Shu returns and starts a reign of terror, trapping a beautiful Mongolian Princess and mastering the yin and yang combination to become almost invincible. Only two swords held by two great swordsmen can stand in his way!

Canada: A Year In The Wild #1
programme.desc: With days growing shorter and colder, Canadian wildlife is in a race against time, and any animal that fails to make the most of what autumn has to offer will perish.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild #2
programme.desc: Winter in Canada is both cruel and beautiful; in the grip of snow and ice, and animals are struggling; however, while some animals hunker down, others have babies to raise who need to adjust to their environment swiftly.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild #3
programme.desc: Spring is late this year, and when it finally arrives, the race is on to find a mate and start a family; black bears and beavers in the west, wood frogs in the south and 20,000 gannets in the east all have one thing on their minds.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild #1
programme.desc: With days growing shorter and colder, Canadian wildlife is in a race against time, and any animal that fails to make the most of what autumn has to offer will perish.

programme.title: Naledi: A Baby Elephants Tale
programme.desc: Naledi follows the journey of a baby elephant orphaned in a rescue camp, as the man tasked with her survival races to protect an entire species while fighting to save her life.

programme.title: Attenboroughs Life In Colour #1
programme.desc: Millions of years ago, the first animals had eyes that were unable to distinguish color -- yet as that changed, seeing in color gave animals many advantages, whether to find food, attract a mate or warn off an enemy.

programme.title: Attenboroughs Life In Colour #2
programme.desc: David Attenborough reveals some of the natural worlds most cunning tricksters and masters of disguise. Discover how some animals use color to hide and disappear into the background, or to trick and deceive.

programme.title: Leguizamo Does America #5
programme.desc: John starts his travels by visiting with up-and-coming trans reggaeton artist, Villano Antillano, who is changing the face and the rules of the game with her music and her existence.

programme.title: Leguizamo Does America #6
programme.desc: John starts his trip by driving to east L.A. with native Angelino, George Lopez.

programme.title: United Plates Of America #13

programme.title: United Plates Of America #14
programme.desc: We kick off with a Greek restaurant that specialises in seafood. We go north up to Harlem to try a new eatery with a New York foodie and we try the delectable tastes of the worlds first fine-dining restaurant, all here in New York.

programme.title: Kamala Harris: The Next President
programme.desc: This documentary explores Kamala Harriss rise from her early life in California to becoming the first female Vice President of the United States, her impact on American politics, and her potential path to becoming the first female President.

programme.title: ABBA: 50 Years Since Eurovision
programme.desc: Chronicling ABBAs rise from Eurovision to global stardom, their iconic sound, record-breaking success, solo endeavors, ABBA Gold revival, and cutting-edge hologram tour Voyage that reunited the virtual band.

programme.title: Janet Jackson: The Art Of Seduction
programme.desc: Noted for her fierce independence, her magnetic aura and her ever so charming voice, Janet Jackson became a catalyst for her growth on MTV; embracing her identity, and reaching up to the heights of stardom.

programme.title: Williams Sisters
programme.desc: The Williams Sisters. Never before has a surname rang so synonymously with the sport of tennis. From inexperienced teenagers to seasoned vets nobody could have predicted the sisters careers, or could they?

programme.title: Rafael Nadal: King Of Clay
programme.desc: This documentary delves into the life of tennis legend Rafael Nadal, exploring his journey from a young prodigy to a global icon. Through triumphs and challenges, it reveals the dedication that defines Nadals legacy on and off the court.

programme.title: Roger Federer: A Champions Journey
programme.desc: Wimbledon Stadiums Honour Board is full of illustrious names. And in 1998, another emerged. Roger Federer. His journey to the top of the mens game is the one of a true champion, in every sense of the word.

programme.title: Novak Djokovic: Refuse To Lose

programme.desc: David Beckham, a household name, footballing icon and at one point the most hated man in England. A comprehensive look at David Beckhams footballing career focusing on his England redemption, World Cup dreams, trial by media and becoming brand Becks.

programme.title: Alaska: A Year In The Wild #4
programme.desc: Humpback whales return to Alaskas rich feeding grounds and salmon return to spawn in the rivers. The returning salmon however have to negotiate a path past hungry brown bears.

programme.title: Alaska: A Year In The Wild #1
programme.desc: The end of winter heralds one of the worlds greatest feeding frenzies as large ocean predators target the millions of fish who have found refuge in the Gulf of Alaska.

programme.title: Alaska: A Year In The Wild #2
programme.desc: With the arrival of spring, days grow longer and temperatures rise. However, spring in Alaska is short. Animals have just two months to find food and start a family, while avoiding predators.

programme.title: United Plates Of America #16

programme.title: Building The Impossible #2

programme.title: Building The Impossible #3

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild #1
programme.desc: With days growing shorter and colder, Canadian wildlife is in a race against time, and any animal that fails to make the most of what autumn has to offer will perish.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild #2
programme.desc: Winter in Canada is both cruel and beautiful; in the grip of snow and ice, and animals are struggling; however, while some animals hunker down, others have babies to raise who need to adjust to their environment swiftly.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild #3
programme.desc: Spring is late this year, and when it finally arrives, the race is on to find a mate and start a family; black bears and beavers in the west, wood frogs in the south and 20,000 gannets in the east all have one thing on their minds.

programme.title: United Plates Of America #17
programme.desc: Kicking off in beautiful Detroit, we meet a local foodie and try some hipster fare. Then off to Cleveland Ohio where we sink our teeth into some amazing barbecue.Then well sample the best chicken and waffles Cleveland has to offer.

programme.title: United Plates Of America #18
programme.desc: Head into the hot American desert to try Cuban food at the magnificent Scott Resort. Then on to the Vegas strip and taste some mouth watering steak. and we eat some magnificent tortillas from the back of a food truck.

programme.title: United Plates Of America #19
programme.desc: We check out what food the Bay Area has to offer, catching up with a local FM morning radio host and try some local fare in Palo Alto and then off to Oakland to visit an American Diner with a Japanese influence.

programme.title: United Plates Of America #20
programme.desc: Comfort food, American style. We try hearty burgers at a hipster burger joint in Washington DC, dumplings made from an age-old home recipe from a Chinese mum in Denver, Colorado and enjoy some comfort food from a lofty American brasserie.

programme.title: United Plates Of America #21
programme.desc: On this episode, we explore all things seafood. From a famous fish dish in Buffalo, New York to the islands of Hawaii for an expensive fish dish then to an inland city in Texas, which is the last place youd expect to find fine seafood.

programme.title: United Plates Of America #22
programme.desc: We try some delicious, fresh seafood in the border city of San Diego and go down to laguna beach to try some delicious Parisian fare in the heart of the O.C.

programme.title: Building The Impossible #3
programme.desc: Travelling to the North of Scotland, Rob discovers the story of the British Oil Industry though its incredible engineering; from first oil to todays innovative rigs.

programme.title: The Dinosaur Echo
programme.desc: The Dinosaur Echo is a documentary about the renaissance of paleontology in Canada today and what dinosaurs can teach us about climate change.

programme.title: Black In Space: Breaking The Color Barrier
programme.desc: The Civil Rights Movement collided with the Space Race as America battled to beat the Soviets to become the first nation to send a black astronaut into orbit.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Museum S3 #4
programme.desc: This week, Secrets of the Museum spotlights industry and design. Curator Martin preps a Maurice Broomfield photo exhibit, while Jenny receives a rare Biba production file. Also featured: a jamdani stole and Josiah Wedgwoods pottery trials.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Museum S3 #5
programme.desc: This week, conservator Adriana cleans a Donatello sculpture, Simon receives Helen Mirrens costume from The Audience, Christopher meets designer Sir Kenneth Grange, and VA Dundee recruits artist Yinka Ilori for a colorful maze.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Museum S3 #1
programme.desc: Secrets of the Museum goes behind the scenes at the VA, featuring Constables prints, Sandy Powells autographed suit, Faberges British works, and new Beano artwork by Laura Howell, the first female Beano artist.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Museum S3 #2
programme.desc: This week at the VA, a pink lame suit for a menswear exhibit, a 10-tonne slice of Robin Hood Gardens for VA East, a bionic arm for Young VA, and Eric Raviliouss Travel tea set are featured.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Museum S3 #3
programme.desc: VA curators uncover untold stories in objects, featuring African fashion, a kente cloth, a James Barnor photograph, and a puzzling Ancient Persian dish.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Museum S3 #4
programme.desc: This week, Secrets of the Museum spotlights industry and design. Curator Martin preps a Maurice Broomfield photo exhibit, while Jenny receives a rare Biba production file. Also featured: a jamdani stole and Josiah Wedgwoods pottery trials.

programme.title: Gerrard: Born To Lead
programme.desc: In an illustrious professional career that spans over 20 years, Gerrard has experienced and succeeded at the pinnacle of the sport, lifting trophies as a player and manager, and representing his country. But with the highs, came the lows.

Totally Outnumbered #1
programme.desc: Totally Outnumbered is a unique Japanese variety game show where one supreme professional from a specific area of expertise faces off with a large group of amateurs in original competitions in each episode.

programme.title: VR Fighter
programme.desc: Bodyguard Long Wei has posttraumatic stress disorder after his wifes death. One day, he encounters Amy who works for a VR technology firm and is invited for a new product test. After the test, Long Wei becomes the firms VR fighter and dons the newly invented armour. However, as mysterious armed men break in, a fierce battle has just begun...

programme.title: Iron Squad W #10
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Love Punch
programme.desc: Talented boxer Jia Yang is caught in an underground fight to clear her fathers debts. She loses her Olympic aspiration and vanishes from the boxing world. 10 years later, Coach Li Yue is determined to help her honour her fathers wish by returning to the ring. As passion and obligation collide, can Jia Yang revive her abandoned boxing dream?

programme.title: RUTE:Toughness Redefined
programme.desc: The growing regional competition R U Tough Enough is searching for the toughest person from Southeast Asia. Join the search and meet some of the most mentally and physically strong individuals, leading up to an epic final showdown in Kuala Lumpur for the prize of US$15,000!

programme.title: The Grey Men
programme.desc: Hong Kong police officer Ah Shan goes undercover in prison to gain the trust of criminal Tian, in order to seek evidence against his gang. After their release from jail, Shan helps Tian rise within the gang and become the new boss. However, just as Shan successfully cracks down on the gang, he uncovers a shocking secret about Tian...

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3 #7
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Song of the Assassins
programme.desc: A young assassin is assigned his first mission while secretly investigating the cause of his familys massacre years ago. While taking on the mission, he finds himself entangled in a political conspiracy that was planned for years and has to use his skills as an assassin to solve whatever comes his way.

programme.title: Iron Squad W #11

programme.title: Extreme Ends #2
programme.desc: Extreme Ends is an action-adventure reality show featuring four celebrities and their special guests experiencing the diversity of Hong Kong! Embark on the journey with two Thai artistes, Gun and Ticha, as they navigate the bustling city life and discover the serene outskirts of Hong Kong.

programme.title: Kungfu Stuntmen
programme.desc: Hong Kong action cinema is famous for its real kung fu moves performed by a group called Kung Fu Stuntmen. This docu-film pays tribute to the generations of kung fu stuntmen, with the crew spending over two years digging archives and interviewing many talents, including the most prominent masters like Jackie Chan, Donnie Yen and Sammo Hung.

programme.title: The Foggy Mountain
programme.desc: Phi, a veteran boxer, sets out on a quest for revenge after the ruthless crime lord Ba Rau killed his wife. His journey takes him into the remote village near Foggy Mountain, where he discovers Ba Raus human trafficking activities. The final showdown is inevitable as Phi must take down Ba Rau to save the villagers and avenge his wifes death.

programme.title: Iron Squad W #12
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. programme.title: The Lost Bladesman
programme.desc: An epic historic adventure set during the turbulent times of the Three Kingdoms. Cao Cao attempts to enlist Guan Yu into his forces, but Guan is loyal to his sworn brother Liu Bei, who is also Caos enemy. As Guan tries to rescue Liu Beis concubine from Cao, he is forced to fight his way through. Can he succeed in the end?

programme.title: Iron Ball #1
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: Operation Bangkok
programme.desc: Military veteran Wu and undercover cop Ming rescue hostages on an island near Bangkok. When Wu discovers his daughter has also been captured, he stays with Ming to fight the thugs and save her.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 #7
programme.desc: Flying squirrels leaping through the air is quite a sight - especially for researchers who know theyre not supposed to be here. The Southern flying squirrel, typically found along the shores of Lake Erie, is now moving its territory up towards Lake Ontar

programme.title: 13 Hours to Survive 1 #1
programme.desc: Descend into the tide pool, where a hermit crab house hunts, a baby catshark runs into strange neighbours, and an octopus terrorises prey. Watch seagulls and other creatures hunt on the surface as the heat rises and oxygen depletes in the pool.

programme.title: 13 Hours to Survive 1 #2
programme.desc: Count down the seconds as the sun sets and predators prowl around the pool before the tide finally rolls in. Persevere as night falls with a kleptomaniacal slug and an acrobatic scallop, while a pair of sneaky crabs take a dangerous shot at romance.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 #2 [Eng/Man]
programme.desc: See how creatures from the Tibetan plateau, to the lush rainforests of Thailand, to Vietnams twisted mangroves, survive four extra hours of daylight once a year, searching for food, fighting for dominance and raising their families.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 #1

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 #1

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 #4 [Eng/Man]
programme.desc: Find out which creatures survive and whose luck will run out as animal mothers and moms-to-be struggle with sweltering temperatures, lurking predators, mating season, and drought on a day that proves to be no holiday.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 #3 [Eng/Man]
programme.desc: In Iceland only one out of six cubs has survived. Abandoned by her parents, she now has to fend for herself. The reindeer herd swim two miles across open water. In Scotland, 35,000 grey seals arrive for their annual breeding season.

programme.title: In for the Kill
programme.desc: Marvel at the clever ways predators use cunning, agility, and breakneck speed when taking down prey. Witness luring behaviours and see how some killers hide in plain sight, while others put weaponry or chemical warfare to work to bring dinner home.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 #4
programme.desc: Kenyas growing human population is taking land and resources away from wildlife. The squeeze is creating increasing numbers of conflicts between humans and animals, and is one of the biggest issues in African conservation.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 2 #5
programme.desc: The Indonesian archipelago lies in the heart of the Coral Triangle, a region of the ocean recognized worldwide as the center of marine biodiversity. With the highest number of coral and fish species on earth, Indonesia has the richest reefs on the planet

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 2 #4
programme.desc: The remote islands of Raja Ampat in the Indonesian archipelago are home to a diversity of marine life, including the secretive giants of the ocean - manta rays. A team of researchers from Conservation International heads out on an expedition to learn more

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 #1
programme.desc: Its spring, and the farm is bursting with new life. Watch a ewe give birth to twins, an orphaned Hereford calf struggle to find a surrogate mother, and the top hen nestle down in her maternity coop.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 #2
programme.desc: Experience life on the farm as things heat up for summer. Watch animals swelter in a rare heatwave, try to stay cool in the nearby freshwater stream, and stash supplies for fall.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 #3 [Eng/Man]
programme.desc: See how one animal familys tragedy is anothers holiday dinner as New Zealands mainland and island creatures, including penguins, flightless birds, sea lions, and sharks, battle to feed and protect their young in this marine environment.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 #1
programme.desc: Dogs around the world come to the rescue in surprising ways. Some search for survivors when disaster strikes or rescue animals from poachers and wildlife traffickers. Others help us in times of troubleboth on land and in the water.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 #2
programme.desc: Meet a border collie that protects aircraft from lethal bird strikes, a sprocker spaniel whose sense of smell is saving imperilled water voles, and an Anatolian shepherd that helps conserve Africas most endangered big cat, the cheetah.

programme.title: Survival of the Beast 1 #4
programme.desc: Track chimpanzees through the Rwandan forest with Max, who tries to convince these powerful monkeys that hes a friend, not a foe. Pick up some key tips on jungle dining and witness complex family dynamics, including grooming and socializing.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 #1
programme.desc: Dogs around the world come to the rescue in surprising ways. Some search for survivors when disaster strikes or rescue animals from poachers and wildlife traffickers. Others help us in times of troubleboth on land and in the water.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 #1
programme.desc: Return to South Luangwa to see the new pups born to the mighty Manzi and the tiny-but-fearless Kakumbi packs. See yearling Snowy face a hungry hyena before a lion pride scatters Manzi mum Wekas pups and leaves her frantically searching for them.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 #1
programme.desc: Dogs around the world come to the rescue in surprising ways. Some search for survivors when disaster strikes or rescue animals from poachers and wildlife traffickers. Others help us in times of troubleboth on land and in the water.

programme.desc: Meet a border collie that protects aircraft from lethal bird strikes, a sprocker spaniel whose sense of smell is saving imperilled water voles, and an Anatolian shepherd that helps conserve Africas most endangered big cat, the cheetah.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 #4 [Eng/Man]
programme.desc: Find out which creatures survive and whose luck will run out as animal mothers and moms-to-be struggle with sweltering temperatures, lurking predators, mating season, and drought on a day that proves to be no holiday.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 #3 [Eng/Man]
programme.desc: In Iceland only one out of six cubs has survived. Abandoned by her parents, she now has to fend for herself. The reindeer herd swim two miles across open water. In Scotland, 35,000 grey seals arrive for their annual breeding season.

programme.title: In for the Kill
programme.desc: Marvel at the clever ways predators use cunning, agility, and breakneck speed when taking down prey. Witness luring behaviours and see how some killers hide in plain sight, while others put weaponry or chemical warfare to work to bring dinner home.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 #4
programme.desc: Kenyas growing human population is taking land and resources away from wildlife. The squeeze is creating increasing numbers of conflicts between humans and animals, and is one of the biggest issues in African conservation.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 2 #5
programme.desc: The Indonesian archipelago lies in the heart of the Coral Triangle, a region of the ocean recognized worldwide as the center of marine biodiversity. With the highest number of coral and fish species on earth, Indonesia has the richest reefs on the planet

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Herbal Symphony #1 Spring
programme.desc: In Uda, discover Japans oldest private medicinal herb garden, where the natural landscape from 300 years ago is preserved in a botanical time capsule, a sanctuary of the local culture and history.

programme.title: The Masterpieces of Tsutaju
programme.desc: This miniseries presents the masterpieces of Tsutaju, a brilliant ukiyo-e producer of the Edo period. This episode features ukiyo-e artist Sharakus The Actor Ichikawa Ebizo as Takemura Sadanoshin.

programme.title: Dining With the Chef
programme.desc: In the city of Akashi, octopus shapes tradition. Chef Hayashi meets local guardians, and unveils a rice dish with an inventive combination of flavors: octopus and umeboshi-the soul of Japan.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: CINEMATIC JOURNEY
programme.desc: Join our explorers as they pursue the cinematic beauty of Japan. Kyle Card hikes the newly designated long trail around majestic Mt. Fuji and discovers its secrets.

programme.title: GRAND SUMO Highlights
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from September 23, Day 10 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Tokyo.

programme.title: Sumopedia
programme.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Nuns Seasonal Calendar
programme.desc: In this episode, we learn about the spring dates of seimei and kokuu. The temple chefs show us how to make two seasonal specialties, yomogi rice cakes and bamboo shoots mixed with sansho leaves.

programme.title: The Masterpieces of Tsutaju
programme.desc: This miniseries presents the masterpieces of Tsutaju, a brilliant ukiyo-e producer of the Edo period. This episode spotlights ukiyo-e artist Sharakus debut work The Actor Otani Oniji III as Edobei.

programme.title: Dive in Tokyo
programme.desc: Ryogoku is known as the home of sumo. As we explore, we learn how the sport took root after a devastating fire in the 17th century. It turns out that the neighborhood has a history of bouncing back!

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: Gojinjo Taiko is a wild, powerful performance by masked drummers. It originated 400 years ago, when villagers disguised themselves as oni (demons) to scare away a warlords army.

programme.title: Nuns Cookbook
programme.desc: The nuns of Otowasan Kannonji Temple show us how to make a simple fall treat thats both beautiful to look at and tasty to eat. Just boil edible chrysanthemums and serve with sweet vinegar.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Kurosaki Yu is a blacksmith specializing in Echizen cutlery, a 700-year-old Japanese craft. His knives are sought after by chefs in Japan and overseas. He talks about achieving ultimate sharpness.

programme.title: JAPANS TOP INVENTIONS
programme.desc: Discover the stories behind renowned Japanese products alongside our reporter. This time: lotion tissues.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: FRONTRUNNERS
programme.desc: Noguchi Tomohisa makes leather from discarded fish skin. We investigate his efforts to utilize waste in the seafood industry, and contribute to sustainability.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Science View
programme.desc: This episode looks at Japans leading shipping innovations, such as the worlds first electric tanker and fuel-saving air lubrication. Also, out-of-body illusions.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Yamamoto Riken won the 2024 Pritzker Prize, architectures highest honor. For decades he has tried to use architecture to revitalize communities. Hear his vision for society and the spaces we build.

programme.desc: Luan turns to Mr. Coconuts for help after she struggles to direct her schools play. // Lisa joins Lynns football team as the analytics coach to prove that math will always beat out heart.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish [Eng/Man]
programme.desc: Devs dad, tech magnate Dale Dimmadome, creates an app designed to track kids wants at the annual Founders Day Festival, but Hazel shows up as an anomaly thanks to Cosmo and Wandas wish granting. Dale programs giant robots to track her down.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: When Danger Force is challenged to compete in Swellviews Street Fightin Championship, they must master the ancient art of street fighting and battle for their honor...without using their superpowers.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: When Chapas beloved long lost cell phone returns to the Mans Nest under mysterious circumstances, her hunt for the truth threatens to destroy Danger Force.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: The Thundermans are visited by High Tide, the former protector of Secret Shores. But when they explain to him that they are the new superheroes in town, he decides to take back his old role, even if it puts Jinx and Booch in danger.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Jaspers summer camp girlfriend comes to town staying with Charlotte. She quickly becomes jealous thinking Charlotte is in love with Jasper. Charlotte begins to question the girls sanity.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles [Eng/Man]
programme.desc: Mikey and Genghis Frog are sent into the storm on a supply run to the local market when they encounter the electrifying LEE THE EEL! Now Mikey has to step up and be a LEADER!

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show [Eng/Man]
programme.desc: A classic villain returns to his former lair, only to find the Star Family inhabiting it. // The Patrick Show rebrands for a younger audience.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants [Eng/Man]
programme.desc: SpongeBob learns his milkshake license has expired, and is forced to go back to the milkshake academy. // Squidward hits his head and reverts to being a baby, and its up to SpongeBob and Patrick to take care of him.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants [Eng/Man]
programme.desc: Squidward gets left with a mess when SpongeBob and Patrick use carrier clams to send messages to each other. // After cooking his kazillionth Krabby Patty, SpongeBob believes hes developed an allergy to them.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants [Eng/Man]
programme.desc: SpongeBob builds a pool in his backyard and Squidward tries to resist taking a dip. // Mr. Krabs must reckon with the Goobfather after he adds Patty Whips to the menu at the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: The Loud House [Eng/Man]
programme.desc: When Leni and her friends start hanging out at Guss, Lincoln and the gang start a turf war for control. // Lucy gets jealous of Lolas newfound attention after she joins the Morticians Club.

programme.title: The Loud House [Eng/Man]
programme.desc: The kids help Dad track down the mystery person who left Lynns Table a bad review online. // The Action News Team has to cater to Chandlers demands after he buys the club new equipment.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish [Eng/Man]
programme.desc: When Hazel wishes to meet a dinosaur, Cosmo and Wanda bring a Baryonyx from the Cretaceous period to present day. // Hazel wishes Jasmine was fearless, but the wish goes awry when Jasmines fears escape and invade the school!

programme.title: The Casagrandes [Eng/Man]
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne tries to convince her Dad to move to the city while he is visiting. With the help of Sid, she devices a plan that seems too good to fail.

programme.title: The Casagrandes [Eng/Man]
programme.desc: Bobby struggles to give up control of the mercado during his pizza-versary date with Lori. // When Ronnie Anne notices that shes the only person Carlitos wont copy, shes determined to change it!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants [Eng/Man]
programme.desc: Mr. Krabs throws a company picnic to boost morale, but Plankton is hosting his own on the same day! // Mr. Krabs regales SpongeBob with tales from his old Navy days.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Charlottes birthday road trip to see the Boo Man Group perform gets sidetracked by a Captain Man and Kid Danger emergency.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: After Phoebe and Max let Chloes friends watch a horror movie and eat candy, Jinx and Boochs parents want to meet Chloes. With Hank and Barb away, Max and Phoebe transform into them to help Chloe. It goes well until the real Hank and Barb show up.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Without them knowing, Captain Man puts Danger Force through a series of tests to see if he can trust them. But when the tests get out of hand, the tables turn on who can be trusted.

programme.title: Thomas and Friends[Eng]
programme.desc: With a new head writer at the helm Thomas returns with classic stories full of fun, excitement and humour.

programme.title: Dessert Masters[Eng]
programme.desc: Its the semi final of Dessert Masters and the five remaining pastry chefs - Gareth, Jess, Kay-Lene, Kirsten and Reynold - are one cook away from a place in the grand finale. To get there, theyll need to cook a delicious dish inspired by nature. Find out which three of five will make it through the final.

programme.title: Eating Plants[Eng]
programme.desc: Host Richie Kul shows us around Thailand, a predominantly Buddhist country whose popular dishes can easily be made exclusively out of plants. He chats with key influencers and entrepreneurs who help promote the vegan lifestyle. He also visits the Elephant Nature Park in Chiang Mai, where animals are treated with compassion and respect.

programme.title: Dessert Masters[Eng]
programme.desc: The Dessert Masters Grand Final is here! Reynold, Gareth and Jess need to battle it out in a two-course service challenge, feeding 15 diners each in 4 hours. These dishes will each be scored out of ten, with forty points on offer total. Whoever is the top scorer will be crowned champion of Dessert Masters and win $100,000.

programme.desc: This week, we travel to Noosa in Queensland, Australia and see kiteboarders flying in the sky and longboard surfers riding the waves. After catching some waves, we cross the Noosa Heads and appreciate the view and grab a cold beer. There is wildlife of all shapes and sizes in Noosa National Park and Kondalilla National Park. We have to conserve nature for generations to come.

programme.title: Ocean Wonders[Eng]
programme.desc: Humpback whales elegant filter feeding recreated using a setup of bubbles, a tank, and rubber ducks in an ice-cold bathtub. Blowfish also explores the pufferfishs defence, the scallops survival strategies, and the endearing parental behaviour of the Tompot blenny. Examining the sand mason worm, he replicates their structure using building bricks.

programme.title: Aerial Profiles[Eng]
programme.desc: We are in South Dakota, an American state whose area is larger than many European countries, but a population of just 900,000. The landscape is full of natural wonders as well as dramatic manmade ones. There are vast open spaces, where the wild Bison once roamed. This was also where a war started with Native Americans when gold was discovered.

programme.desc: Our host, Michael, and his friends attempt to narrowboat the canals in the UK, going towards the shortest canal in the network. However, in order to reach their goal, theyre going to have to navigate one of the worlds few operating boat lifts and flight lock.

programme.title: Pearl Spectacular:Guyana[Eng]
programme.desc: Guyanas inaccessible hinterland is characterized by endless, untouched rainforests. This country is the world of giant otters, jaguars, harpy eagles, black caimans, as well as a variety of other impressive wildlife. It is also rich in gold and diamonds, the mining of which is monitored. Between canopy and forest floors there is an infinite variety of species, many are endemic.

The Sea Monster
programme.desc: To stop the Japanese pirates and find his missing friend, the Ming dynasty Marine Officer Lin Xiao joins the Marine General to embark on a treasure hunt. On the way, they encounter a mysterious sea monster as well as the pirates. Lin must join forces with the marine team to battle against them and accomplish their mission.

programme.title: Feng Qi Luo Yang
programme.desc: In Zhou dynasty, two girls living in two ends of the Luo He River come from diverse backgrounds - one is a captains daughter and another is a common swindler - and they encounter a series of mysterious events in Luo Yang City. Both team up to investigate a series of bizarre cases, to uphold justice and to maintain order amidst a social upheaval.

programme.title: Back on the Society
programme.desc: Triad boss Zhang was jailed when his wife died after giving birth to their daughter. When Zhang is released, he decides to quit the triad and take care of his daughter but accidentally kills the triad boss. Ta Lis brother, Cha, takes revenge by kidnapping Zhangs daughter, resulting in a deadly battle between the two men.

programme.title: Monster Hunter
programme.desc: In the Republican time in Shanghai, monster hunter Yu saves an actress in a play from a monsters attack, at the same time interrupting a cops love confession for her. As the trio gets involved in a series of mysterious cases, they find out that the cases are related to a legend about a giant monster who will soon be returning to the world...

programme.title: Miss Agent
programme.desc: Asias biggest human trafficker Ba Song, invites the triad bosses to attend his private party. Ya Mei sneaks in and helps her teammates to escape by setting off a bomb, at the same time faking the death of herself and her fiancee. Three years later, Mei must resume duty to fight against Ba Song in order to save her kidnapped fiancee.

programme.title: The River Monster
programme.desc: Demon killer Liu Yi Dao retires from the martial arts world to find a doctor for his ailing sister. Meanwhile, the demon clan is plotting against the human world. Liu encounters Xiao Luan, a Koi Spirit recincarnated from the Black Dragon, who is also hunted by the demon clan. Can Liu save Xiao Luan and stop the battle?

programme.title: Almost Human
programme.desc: A science maniac creates an advanced humanlike robot, which accidentally develops its own thinking. It takes on the appearance of Susan by evil technology, and approaches her boyfriend. Meanwhile, police officer Li investigates a series of mysterious murder cases. A battle between humans and robots is about to begin.

programme.title: Mohist Mechanism
programme.desc: Shen Tuo, a descendant of Mohist Mechanism, is invited by the prison chief to find a magnet in the prison basement with a team of six. However, there is a rumour that no one can leave the basement alive. Determined to save his wife and free the prisoners, Shen embarks on a dangerous journey through the citys labyrinth of mechanism.

programme.title: Anti Drug Campaign
programme.desc: Lin Lang and Lin Feng witness their mothers murder by the drug dealer Tiger fifteen years ago. They separated in their escape and Feng becomes a narcotics police officer while Lang disappears. In an operation, Feng discovers that Tiger has also killed the mother of a drug boss, Lang. Is Lang his brother? Can Feng arrest the drug dealers?

programme.title: Queen of Triads
programme.desc: Drug lords Kun and Hao prosper amidst a corrupt landscape in the 1970s Hong Kong. ICAC officer Rose embarks on a mission to infiltrate Haos gang to gather evidence. However, as Rose and Hao fall in love, she faces a heart-wrenching dilemma choosing between her duty to bring him down and the irresistible pull of their intensifying romance.

programme.title: The Great Illusionist
programme.desc: Illusionist Robin assists a police officer to investigate a serial murder. While they discover that most victims are incognito illusionists, Robin thinks that the murderer kills for a treasure, and later identifies Mei as the culprit who uses dark illusions to kill. Mei summons White Tiger to fight against the Fire Dragon commanded by Robin.

programme.title: Strange Door and Dark Blade
programme.desc: Agent Tang is trained by the secret society to work undercover in the imperial government. Tang wants to quit for a peaceful life with her husband but is forced to kill the Imperial Prince when the society holds her husband hostage. Tang resolves to break free and joins forces with the Imperial Prince to destroy the society and restore peace.

programme.title: The Story of Tang BoHu
programme.desc: Tang Bo Hu spends lavishly on a woman but is outbid by a mysterious man. Angered, Tang punches the man, who is actually the Emperor. He sneaks into the palace to evade arrest, but gets entangled in a revolt led by King Feng. As Tang discovers that the evidence of Fengs rebellion is hidden in a painting, he vows to uncover the plot.

programme.title: Invisible Alien
programme.desc: Captain Yuan and his crew explore the mysteries of outer space after the Space Centre detected extraterrestrial signals. However, the spacecrafe vanishes after lift-off. 150 years later, the spacecraft reappears, harboring a female scientist. The secret in the outer space is unveiled through her recollection of the crews peculiar experience.

programme.title: White Haired Witch
programme.desc: In late Ming dynasty, conflicts arise between the Justice Cult and the Demon Cult. The White Haired Witch is entangled in a conspiracy amidst the battle of the martial arts world. As Imperial guard Chang An investigates on her, he falls for the White Haired Witch. Finally, Chang An uncovers the true leader of the Demon Cult, thus clearing her name.

programme.title: Raid
programme.desc: Meng, a Volunteer Army platoon leader, is commissioned to rescue a platoon in captive. Through arduous trials, Meng teams up with another platoon leader, Du. They decide to contain the enemys artillery supply to reduce casualties, and vow to dedicate themselves to fight against the foes for their people.

programme.title: Zhan Xian Fei Dao
programme.desc: Emperor Zhou Wu has defeated the Shang empire with General Yang defeating the Shang army. Military advisor Shen advises Emperor Shang to recruit Seven Monsters with mystic skills to attack Zhou, so Emperor Shang orders his general to find Seven Monsters in Mountain Mei. The battle between Zhou and Shang has just begun!

programme.title: Nowhere to Hide
programme.desc: In 2040s, a group of customers visits an illegal restaurant serving wild animal meat. Suddenly, a giant lizard mutant escapes from the cage and the restaurant staff disappears one by one. Meanwhile, a rat catcher is tasked by the restaurant to exterminate rats, but it turns out to be a terrifying battle against the lizard.

programme.title: Nowhere to Hide
programme.desc: In 2040s, a group of customers visits an illegal restaurant serving wild animal meat. Suddenly, a giant lizard mutant escapes from the cage and the restaurant staff disappears one by one. Meanwhile, a rat catcher is tasked by the restaurant to exterminate rats, but it turns out to be a terrifying battle against the lizard.

programme.title: Intra Game Robbery
programme.desc: While hotpot restaurants thrive in Hong Kong, a young man taking over his fathers hotpot business faces tough times ahead. He remains resilient and insists on keeping all his staffs, hoping for a turnaround. When gangsters hold his staffs, customers and fiancee hostage in the restaurant one day, he vows to fight back and bring them to justice.

programme.title: Fantasy Magician
programme.desc: In the battle between human and demons, human race leader, Huang Di, restores peace by magical astronomy and establishes the Wu Yin Sect. During an escape, Detective Zhou encounters the dying Wu Yin Sect boss, who passes on his martial arts skills to Zhou. With the help of the sect, Zhou finds his inner power to defeat the demons.

programme.title: The Queen of KungFu 2
programme.desc: Cult leader Ah Xi is a top martial artist who is also a skilled Huo Drunken Fist fighter. However, she chooses to become an incognito swordswoman who fights against evil. Warlord Xiao Ba Tin colludes with some bandits and force the poor to plant opium. Ah Xi steps up to fight against them and finally exterminate the evil gang.

programme.title: Apolar Battlefield
programme.desc: In the late Yuan dynasty, a secret gang invites top martial arts masters to an event to showcase a martial arts treasure, with an intention to drug the masters so that they fall under their control and can serve the gang. Tai Chi master Zhang San Feng attends the event to uncover their plot and successfully destroys the evil gang in the end.

programme.title: Dragon Sword: Outlander
programme.desc: A seeker of immortality, Fu falls through a rift into the realm of monsters on way to an ancient battlefield. As he fights his way out, Fu meets Master Lin who helps him flee and imparts skills to him. After he leaves the forest, Fu witnesses the reincarnation of the spider demon, and commences his thrilling immortal journey.

programme.title: Water Monster
programme.desc: Forensic pathologist Qing investigates her brothers murder by the water monkeys in a town where the curse of a vengeful monkey ensues. Armed with a gun, Qing ventures to the forbidden land of Water Monster and debunks superstitions with scientific facts, ultimately leading the villagers to fight against the evil forces.

programme.title: The First Myth Clash of Gods
programme.desc: In late Shang dynasty, the deities of Tong Tian Cult are killed by the Zhou army led by Jiang Zi Ya. Fueled by anger, the Cult leader unites with Shen Gong Pao to exterminate the Zhou army by setting up a thousand deities trap. Meanwhile, Jiang Zi Ya join forces with Yang Jian, Na Zha and other deities to fight the evil forces and rescue mankind.

programme.title: Crazy Old Father
programme.desc: Motivated by his father, a retired athlete helps the female soccer team to win the game and ease the plight of the school. This inspirational story showcases the effort by people to achieve a better life while working hard at relationships with family members, lovers, teachers and students.

programme.title: Soul Eating Spider
programme.desc: Leaders of Long Sect and Yi Sect battled and the Yi Sect was defeated. 12 years later, Lang Yan, Long Sects leader, is poisoned by the spider demon. As Longs guard and Ji Xin investigate the case, they uncover a plot by Yis descendants to unleash spider demons onto Long to create chaos. The battle between good and evil will soon begin....

programme.title: Story Machine
programme.desc: The movie consists of four short stories: a fairy tale about a kid turning into a rabbit, a suspense story about a man trapped in a haunted wall during a date, a love story about a lad with supernatural power sacrificing his organ for his lover, and a fantasy tale about magical pleasures after eating the chicken soup noodles sold in the city.

programme.title: The General Yu Dayou
programme.desc: In the Ming Dynasty, people living at the coastal area suffer under the Japanese pirates and bandits, and the young Yu uncovers their plots, thereby saving his country and the people. While young Yu aspires to be a warrior, he eventually learns that he must use his sword to protect the people and the country to become a true hero.

programme.title: Fearless Kungfu King
programme.desc: Young Huo Yuan Jia loves marital arts. He defeats seven martial arts school masters to establish himself in Tianjin, but is set up by a court official during a tournament. When Huo escorts a revolutionary leader to the capital, he finally understands that the country and its people are the ultimate purpose for practising martial arts.

programme.title: Mutation On Mars
programme.desc: Elite scientists worldwide plan to cultivate several plant and animal species on Jupiter to combat resource scarcity on Earth. However, the species mutate and attack the scientists. Chinese astronauts are sent to Jupiter on a rescue mission, and they fight fearlessly with the unknown species to save the scientists in Jupiter.

programme.title: The Big Explosion
programme.desc: In the Chen Dynasty, Chen Ling is assigned to investigate a supernatural case in Wu Xiang City. There, a man who pretends to help Chen Ling wants to steal a supernatural plant whose poison will cause people to bite each other, so as to take revenge on Chen and the master who killed his tribe. A fierce battle has just begun!

programme.title: Lost in Apocalypse
programme.desc: Gou and his friends encounter a food virus outbreak at the hotel, which causes infected people to bite others insanely. Gou tries to bring his friends out from the hotel but this results in a fierce battle with those being infected. As conflicts and suspicions arise during the escape, can they finally reconcile and flee successfully?

programme.title: Wu Shen Zhao Zilong
programme.desc: In the Eastern Han Dynasty, young Zhao Zi Long and his comrade Xia Hou Lan accidentally get involved in the chaos, but they end up with different paths in life. Zhao Zi Long finally triumphs over the selfish Xia Hou Lan and fights against the dark forces, teaming up with Liu Bei and achieving victories for the Han dynasty in the end.

programme.title: Wu Shen Zhao Zilong
programme.desc: In the Eastern Han Dynasty, young Zhao Zi Long and his comrade Xia Hou Lan accidentally get involved in the chaos, but they end up with different paths in life. Zhao Zi Long finally triumphs over the selfish Xia Hou Lan and fights against the dark forces, teaming up with Liu Bei and achieving victories for the Han dynasty in the end.

programme.title: The Revenge of Plant
programme.desc: Huo, a famous university botany professor, uses animal and plant DNAs to develop a virus. His assistant, Cheng, falls in love with his student, Ke, but Ke gets infected during a sudden virus outbreak in the university. To save Ke and the university, Cheng stumbles upon the professors secret laboratory and unveils a secret between Huo and Ke.

programme.title: The Warlord of The Sea
programme.desc: In the distant future, most land is submerged due to extreme weather, forcing humans to live in the tiny Wu Ji City and they must find a new continent to survive. When the marine police discovers a map of a new land in the Lone Sea, officer Luo Li teams up with Hai Ji, and along with his fleet, embark on a journey there.

programme.title: Zhao Zi Long
programme.desc: After hiding in Mount Zhang for seven years, Zhao Zi Long reunites with Liu Bei and Zhao Yun. Persuaded by Lius righteousness, Zhao rediscovers his aspirations and rallies his comrades to battle their enemies at Chang Ban Slope. He eventually defeats the enemies and emerges as the Great General of the Han Dynasty.

programme.title: Mad Spider Sea
programme.desc: Navy officer Ah Jie returns to the fleet to earn a living and tries to recover from the trauma of his comrades death. The fleet encounters severe rainstorm and has to face an unknown sea creature. In the face of adversity, everyone on board must overcome the challenges to trust and support each other in order to escape from danger.

programme.title: The Magic Lotus Lantern
programme.desc: Young Yang Jian ventures to earth to find the stolen Lotus Lantern that safeguards the world. He falls in love with a mortal girl, and they team up to attack the demon king who threatens to subvert the six realms. In the end, the couple successfully safeguard the Lotus Lantern and restore peace.

programme.title: Journey to the East
programme.desc: Han Miao is one of the eight immortals living in a desert. Dragon Maiden, who helms the East Ocean, loses her memory and becomes a fish demon. When she encounters her destined lover, Han Miao, they quickly fall in love. With help from a guru, they set out for Dragon Gate where Dragon Maiden can resume her identity and locate the water source.

programme.title: My Kungfu Girlfriend
programme.desc: Yu Sheng Nan rushes to get married to fulfil her dying fathers wish and forces Niu, a man she just knew, to sign a bogus marriage agreement. As Yu gradually falls for Niu, her expelled senior returns and forces Yu to accept his duel challenge by threatening her with Nius safety. A deadly martial arts fight has just begun!

programme.title: Mulan Legend
programme.desc: Northern Wei empire faces raids from the nomadic Rou Ran tribe. The princess of Wei is kidnapped by a Rou Ran general, who demands ten cities as ransom. Weis General Mulan forms a special task force to rescue the princess and a fatal battle has just begun!

programme.title: The Mystic Nine
programme.desc: Lu and Da are assigned to protect a military officer, but he dies suddenly. As Lu investigates, he finds a dance girl and her brother suspicious, and the brother suddenly goes missing. Lu, Da and the dance girl find themselves involved in a conspiracy and after much investigation, Lu finds the culprit and unravels the secret of a hidden treasure.

programme.title: Coffin Mountain Ancient Tomb
programme.desc: Zhang Sanye joins his junior He Lao Dao on a quest to a fabled tomb said to hold treasures and the secrets of immortality. However, as the tomb is about to open, warlord Luo Man Zi suddenly appears, and it turns out to be a plot set up by both Luo and He for Zhang. A thrilling journey into the tomb has just begun!

programme.title: Queen of Triads 4
programme.desc: Interpol officer Tie Jia Wen mourns the loss of her lover, and lives incognito as a gym owner with her coaches, Meng Jing, Xi Xi and Dong Ni. However, Tie is troubled by her past when vengeful triad gangs come after her and her coaches. Vowing to uphold justice, Tie decides to fight against the evil gangsters.

programme.title: Bull Demon King Rise Again
programme.desc: Set in ancient times, leader of the demon tribe, Chi You, causes chaos in heaven and is demoted to become a kind human. When Chi Yous evil power awakens years later, he find ways to break his seal in Kun Lun, where he meets a princess and fall in love. Through perilous trials, Chi You and the princess unravel the truth behind a conspiracy.

programme.title: The Woman King
programme.desc: Inspired by true events, Viola Davis stars in an action-packed story of an elite all-female unit of warriors determined to defend their nation.

programme.title: Fast Furious 7
programme.desc: Dominic Toretto and crew face a deadly new enemyDeckard Shawseeking revenge in this high-octane chapter of the Fast Furious saga. Action explodes as the team fights to protect their own.

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: A gladiator who rose up from his beginnings as a slave races against time in order to rescue his beloved before an erupted volcano destroys the whole city.

programme.title: Terminator Salvation

Rooftop
programme.desc: A group of friends invites Paul to a secret party on their campus rooftop. When a prank accidentally kills Paul, the friends cover up the incident and promised never to disclose it. Paul vows to take revenge by becoming a vicious ghost to haunt them into taking responsibility for their actions.

programme.title: Midnight Ruins
programme.desc: Fallen painter Cheng Zihao is asked to investigate the strange events that occurred during the rehearsal of a play Song of the Night by an old friend. This play was rehearsed by them in the past, and has brought him many pains and nightmares. As Cheng Zihao uncovers the truth, he is shocked by the same story of love and hate after so many years

programme.title: Whisper of Silent Body
programme.desc: Renowned as the corpse whisperer, forensic pathologist Qin Ming uncovers vital clues from the corpses. During a homicide investigation, he unravels a murder case sixteen years ago in the snowy mountain with his assistant and a detective. Together, they unveil the secrets of the mysterious homicide.

programme.title: Watch Me Kill
programme.desc: A ruthless assassin named Luciana is hired by a kingpin to murder a man with a valuable diamond. Complications ensue when Luciana stumbles upon a teenage girl who is held captive by the man, and the kingpin discovers that the diamond Luciana turned over is fake.

programme.title: Sinister - The Gates of Hell
programme.desc: Artiste Yin Qing enters Hells Gate through a supernatural TV show and reunites with her late friend Mei Qi. At Mei Qis gravesite, Yin Qing encounters Mei Qis husband, Dong Sheng, and a series of mysterious incidents unfold. She then brings Dong Sheng onto the show, where Mei Qi exposes his infidelity and reveals the conspiracy behind her death.

programme.title: Night at the Eagle Inn
programme.desc: A pair of fraternal twins spend a terrifying night in a remote inn to investigate the last known whereabouts of their father who mysteriously disappeared the night they were born. As they dive deeper, the propertys dark secrets ensnare them in a hellish labyrinth which they must escape before dawn.

programme.title: In Cycle
programme.desc: A seemingly happy couple who loves diving come to a deserted island for a diving vacation, which is part of the husbands plan to murder his wife. His conspiracy however, is intervened by a series of bizarre events on the island. Can the couple eventually escape from the enigmatic ocean?

programme.title: The Ones You Didnt Burn
programme.desc: After their fathers death, Nathan and his sister return to their family home to prepare it for sale. While there, Nathan discovers that the land was stolen from the ancestors of two women accused of witchcraft. As he delves deeper, he uncovers an occult conspiracy linked to their fathers death which now threatens them both.

programme.title: 3AM #1
programme.desc: The Hungry Ghost Festival is around the corner. A newcomer at a workplace offends the ghosts in his office building when he shows disrespect for the spirits on his first day at work. LAI suddenly receives a phone call and realizes that his company needs to make compensation to customers for the poor quality of some products. LAI meets PIK and PIK voluntarily lends him 500 thousand dollars. CHUEN meets KIT and they learn that LAI suddenly collapses at PIKs clinic. They rush to the clinic and realize that PIK is handing over a cheque to LAI. KIT rev

programme.title: Karma Rider#4[Can]
programme.desc: Eighteen years ago, TIN-BONG rescued YAT-CHIN and he put him outside the place where the Dogen Zen priests lived. TIN-BONG was trying to kill LAW KEUNG but he discovered that LAW KEUNG had died already. He then saw a scene of "Divine Secret" that CHAN AH-SUM who queued up behind him would die. TIN-BONG didnt know what to do.

programme.title: Karma Rider#5[Can]
programme.desc: Master PAK from Kau Lau Village sends a golden pig to East Kau Lau to tease YAT-YAT for not able to capture YAT-CHIN. BIG TWIN and LITTLE TWIN suddenly arrive with gifts to divert YAT-YATs attention so that the Three Scallion Sisters can rescue FOON SHU. FOON SIU successfully abducts YAT-YAT but YAT-YATs son HOK-YEE ruins her plan. All the Three Scallion Sisters are captured.

programme.title: Lo And Behold#1983[Can]
programme.desc: MAY meets a troublesome car owner when she tries to park the car. SHU-YAN pretends to be her boyfriend to negotiate with this car owner and he scares him away successfully. SHU-YANs heroic act is widely discussed and many single female colleagues ask him to help solving their problems by pretending to be their boyfriend. SHU-YAN finds it unbearable and he discovers that he is being used. He airs his grievances to all family members and receives a suggested solution from the

programme.title: Lo And Behold#1984[Can]
programme.desc: KAM-WAI and TIN-NGO go travelling in Switzerland. There is a sudden snowslide when KAM-WAI is skiing alone and he is missing. SAU-KAM rushes to Switzerland after knowing it. As advised by KA-CHUNG, LIK-LIN stays at office to prevent LIK-SEE from taking control of the company. As the disappearance of KAM-WAI should not be disclosed, LIK-SEE announces that KAM-WAI has extended his trip and he will act as the chairman temporarily. LIK-LIN and LIK-SEE keep fighting with each oth

programme.title: Lo And Behold#1985[Can]
programme.desc: LIK-LIN invites CHEUNG OI-YING to a media interview and they pretend to be bosom friends in front of the reporters. LIK-LIN discovers that OI-YING is still using SAU-KEI after being cheated by him and she thinks that OI-YING is too innocent. She later discovers that SAU-KEI has sold OI-YINGs limited edition handbags privately and she unmasks him but OI-YING still speaks for him. LIK-LIN suspects that OI-YING is so forgiving because she loves SAU-KEI. KA-CHUNG takes pictures

programme.title: GAME OF DECEIT#9[Can]
programme.desc: SHEK decides to force CHING to marry YUK. However, both CHING and YUK are reluctant to get married. YIN and SHEK pretend to be very sick so as to rush them to get married before they die. CHING has suffered a lot on the wedding date. CHING is mad. He asks JIAN to hide all cash gifts from the guests for his own. However, YEE cheats the fortune out of JIAN. Though CHING is very angry, he forgives JIAN. CHING and YUK always quarrel. However, they pretend to get along well in fr

programme.title: Marriage Of Inconvenience#7[Can]
programme.desc: While washing the clothes, JIAO mistakenly damages the jacket that LING borrowed from CHI. JIAO tries to apologize to LING and she accidentally discovers that LING didnt commit adultery with CHI. CHI invites his divorced friend LAI to join the club while PIK invites her old patient KIT to join the club. YUK asks his friend, HONG, to help. Together, they succeed to clear the mess. The Governor rewards them. CHING naively thinks that he has succeeded. YUK sends CHING away to Hangzhou so as to avoid losing face. CHING meets YEE in Hangzhou. The rich merchants want CHING to examine whether YEE is a virgin. CHING is very embar

programme.title: Marriage Of Inconvenience#9[Can]
programme.desc: Both CHUEN and LING get the same points on their "battle" for the ownership of the house so each of them can pick up one room for exclusive use. LING chooses the kitchen while CHUEN chooses the toilet. This really gives LING a hard time at home. CHUENs parents finally discover the details of the "contest". HUNG is enraged. programme.title: Marriage Of Inconvenience#10[Can]
programme.desc: After the fight, LING helps CHI to treat his wounds. CHI seizes the chance to declare his love to LING but LING declines him courteously. In order to improve the business, CHUEN asks KAM to introduce the scientific matching technique to their company. By using this technique, CHING discovers that her husband LONG is very popular among women. She is so worried that she goes to his office to make a mess and LONG scolds her angrily. programme.title: Karma Rider#6[Can]
programme.desc: YAT-YAT invites the villagers from Kau Lau Village to come and witness the scene of hanging YAT-CHIN. Afterwards, he celebrates with his son and offers sacrifice to his deceased wife. TAI-PING tries to kill YAT-YAT but TIN-BONG and YAT-CHIN arrive to rescue him. YAT-YAT is very grateful to YAT-CHIN but YAT-CHIN only wants him to release FOON SHU and the Four Scallion Sisters.

programme.title: Karma Rider#7[Can]
programme.desc: FOON HEI, YAT-CHIN and TIN-BONG say goodbye to FAVUS BOY. They try to give him a new name. FOON HEI asks YAT-CHIN why he has got this name. TIN-BONG expresses his views on it and it is very similar with what YAT-CHINs mentor thought. A very skillful white haired doctor arrives at Ma Heung Town. SIU-HING and SIU-YUK bring FOON SHU to visit him.

programme.title: Lo And Behold#1986[Can]
programme.desc: LIK-LIN and SUM-YU want to leave the tuition centre out of various reasons.
